body:
Title says it all. I want it to run Minecraft and a few Steam games around 60fps. Budget is $600. Also one that doesn't overheat that much.


Don't tell me to build a PC, because I need it to be portable :P
body_tagged:

Don't tell me to build a PC, because I need it to be portable :P
title: Gaming laptop around 500-600 dollars?

replies.body: Thanks for the suggestion, but I'd like something I can just buy. :)
replies.body_tagged: Thanks for the suggestion, but I'd like something I can just buy. :)

replies.body: Buy the parts, then build it :]
replies.body_tagged: Buy the parts, then build it :]

replies.body: Like I said, I'd rather just buy a laptop than build one. Thanks anyways =3
replies.body_tagged: Like I said, I'd rather just buy a laptop than build one. Thanks anyways =3

reply_to.body: Buy the parts, then build it :]
reply_to.body_tagged: Buy the parts, then build it :]

replies.body: A PC is portable as long as you get a wagon to go with it.
replies.body_tagged: A PC is portable as long as you get a wagon to go with it.

replies.body:
Haha ive been looking for something around the same price range and so far I have found this one :D
https://laptopninja.io/laptops/acer-laptop-aspire-e5-573g-59c3-15-6-inch/
Its got some really good parts like the i5 and a NVIDIA GeForce 940M :D
